AT.name: Iron Combat: War in the Air
AT.description: Der Himmel ist ein einziges Schlachtfeld und nur du, eine lebende Waffe, bist die letzte Hoffnung um eine bösartige Organisation aufzuhalten die die Menschheit versklaven will. Bewege dich in der Luft als hochentwickelte Kampfmaschine und transformiere in den Hi-Tech Mecha um dem Feind den Gnadenstoß zu geben. Mit jedem Sieg erlangst du Punkte mit denen du mächtige Waffen und Verbesserungen kaufen kannst. Erstelle dir so einen einzigartigen Kämpfer mit dem jede Schlacht ein neues Erlebnis ist. Werde zur mächtigsten Waffe die die Menschheit jemals gesehen hat! Kannst du der Held werden den die Menschheit braucht um Gerechtigkeit walten zu lassen? - Steuere, jage und schieße in einem realistischen Luftkampf-Modus und vernichte Feinde im Mecha-Angriffsmodus - Bekämpfe unzählige Feinde in der Luft und auf dem Boden - Sammle Punkte, kaufe dir Waffen und Verbesserungen - Leichte Steuerung, atemberaubende 3D-Grafik - Schließe Missionen ab und erfahre die ganze Geschichte oder spiele im Frei-Modus

CZ.name: Iron Combat: War in the Air
CZ.description: The skies of future Earth are endless battlefields and you have volunteered to become a living weapon, the last hope to vanquish an evil corporation bent on enslaving mankind. Chase in the air as a sophisticated fighter aircraft, then transform into a hi-tech mecha to finish off the enemy. Victories earn you credits that can be used to purchase powerful weapons and upgrades. Fully customize your abilities and use new powers, you choose how to make every battle unique. Become the mightiest weapon humanity has ever seen! Are you the hero Earth needs for ultimate justice? Features: - Maneuver, chase and fire in realistic Air Combat Mode, close with the enemy and destroy in thrilling Mecha Assault Mode - Fight hundreds of enemies and bosses, in the air and on the ground - Tally kills to purchase weapons & upgrades to customize your vehicle - Easy controls, stunning 3D effects and highly immersive graphics - Clear missions and reveal the storyline in Campaign Play, or master every level in Free Play

BG.name: Iron Combat: War in the Air
BG.description: The skies of future Earth are endless battlefields and you have volunteered to become a living weapon, the last hope to vanquish an evil corporation bent on enslaving mankind. Chase in the air as a sophisticated fighter aircraft, then transform into a hi-tech mecha to finish off the enemy. Become the mightiest weapon humanity has ever seen! Are you the hero Earth needs for ultimate justice? Features: - Maneuver, chase and fire in realistic Air Combat Mode, close with the enemy and destroy in thrilling Mecha Assault Mode - Fight hundreds of enemies and bosses, in the air and on the ground - Tally kills to purchase weapons & upgrades to customize your vehicle - Easy controls, stunning 3D effects and highly immersive graphics - Clear missions and reveal the storyline in Campaign Play, or master every level in Free Play

BE.name: Iron Combat: War in the Air
BE.description: La Terre du futur est un champ de bataille sans fin. Vous êtes devenu une arme vivante, l'espoir de vaincre une société malfaisante qui veut mettre l'humanité en esclavage. Volez dans le ciel, puis transformez-vous en robot de pointe pour vaincre l'ennemi. Les victoires rapportent des crédits permettant d'acheter des armes et des mises à niveau. Adaptez-vous et utilisez vos nouveaux pouvoirs pour rendre chaque bataille unique. Devenez l'arme la plus puissante que l'humanité n'a jamais vue! Êtes-vous le héros dont la Terre a besoin? - Manœuvrez, chassez et tirez en mode Combat Aérien, approchez l'ennemi et détruisez-le en tant que Robot en mode Combat - Combattez des centaines d'ennemis, dans le ciel comme au sol - Achetez des armes et des mises à niveau afin d'améliorer votre véhicule - Commandes faciles, effets 3D stupéfiants et une immersion graphique spectaculaire - Faites les missions pour découvrir l'histoire en mode jeu de Campagne, ou maîtrisez chaque niveau dans le Jeu Libre

ES.name: Iron Combat: War in the Air
ES.description: El cielo de la tierra es una contante batalla y tú eres voluntario para convertirte en un arma viviente, la última esperanza para vencer a la malvada corporación que esclaviza a la humanidad. Pelea en el aire como un avanzado caza y transfórmate en un sofisticado mecha para acabar con el enemigo. Consigue créditos y úsalos para comprar armas y mejoras. Personaliza tus habilidades, utiliza nuevos poderes y elige como hacer única cada batalla. ¡Conviértete en el arma más potente que la humanidad haya visto! ¿Eres tú el héroe que la Tierra necesita para impartir justicia? - Batalla en el realista Modo de Combata Aéreo, acércate al enemigo y destrúyelo con el emocionante Modo de Asalto Mecha - Pelea con cientos de enemigos en tierra y aire - Haz recuento para comprar armas y mejoras con las que personalizar tu vehículo - Controles fáciles, increíbles efectos 3D y gráficos con gran definición - Completa misiones y descubre la historia en el Modo Campaña, o domina cada nivel en el Modo Libre

IT.name: Iron Combat: War in the Air
IT.description: I cieli del Pianeta Terra sono sconfinati campi di battaglia. Hai deciso di diventare un’arma vivente e sei l’ultima speranza per sgominare una multinazionale senza scrupoli che vuole assoggettare il genere umano. Solca il cielo e trasformati in un Mecha per annientare il nemico. Vincendo guadagnerai crediti per acquistare armi straordinarie e potenziamenti. Personalizza le tue abilità e utilizza poteri nuovi: puoi scegliere come rendere unica qualsiasi battaglia. Diventa l’arma più poderosa mai vista prima! Sei tu l’eroe di cui il Pianeta ha bisogno per avere giustizia? - Vola e spara nella realistica modalità Air Combat, annienta il nemico in Assalto Mecha - Combatti contro centinaia di avversari, per aria e a terra - Annienta più nemici possibile per acquistare armi e potenziamenti per il tuo veicolo - Comandi facili, effetti 3D strepitosi e grafica coinvolgente - Completa le missioni e scopri lo storyline nella modalità Campagna oppure completa tutti i livelli in Free Play

NL.name: Iron Combat: War in the Air
NL.description: Ergens in een verre toekomst. Het luchtruim van de aarde is een slagveld. Jij bent een levend wapen, de laatste hoop in de strijd tegen een snode genootschap die de mensheid wil onderwerpen. Verken het luchtruim als gevechtsvliegtuig en transformeer je tot een high-tech robot om de vijand af te maken. Overwinningen leveren credits op waarmee je krachtige wapens en upgrades koopt. Personaliseer je vermogens en maak elk gevecht uniek. Word het machtigste wapen in de geschiedenis van de mensheid! Ben jij de held die ultieme gerechtigheid kan brengen? - Verken, jaag en schiet op de vijand in de realistische luchtgevechtmodus, vernietig je tegenstander in de spannende robotaanvalmodus - Vecht met honderden vijanden en bazen in de lucht en op de grond - Versla tegenstanders om wapens en upgrades te kopen en je tuig te personaliseren - Gemakkelijke bediening, geweldige 3d-effecten en meeslepende graphics - Speel missies uit in campagnemodus of overwin elk level in vrije modus

PT.name: Iron Combat: War in the Air
PT.description: Os céus da Terra são campos de batalha intermináveis e você se voluntariou para ser uma arma viva, a última esperança para derrotar uma corporação maléfica determinada a escravizar a humanidade. Persiga no ar como avião de combate sofisticado e se transforme em mecha de alta tecnologia para acabar com o inimigo. Ganhe créditos com vitórias que podem ser usados para comprar armas e melhoramentos. Personalize suas capacidades e use novos poderes; torne cada batalha única. Seja a arma mais poderosa que a humanidade já viu! Será você o herói que a Terra precisa para ter justiça? - Manobre, persiga e dispare no Modo de Combate Aéreo, se aproxime do inimigo e destrua-o no Modo de Ataque Mecha - Lute contra centenas de inimigos e bosses, no ar e em terra - Acumule mortes para comprar armas e aprimoramentos para personalizar seu veículo - Controles simples, efeitos 3D incríveis e gráficos altamente envolventes - Complete missões e revele o enredo no Modo Campanha ou domine cada nível no Modo Livre

RO.name: Iron Combat: War in the Air
RO.description: The skies of future Earth are endless battlefields and you have volunteered to become a living weapon, the last hope to vanquish an evil corporation bent on enslaving mankind. Chase in the air as a sophisticated fighter aircraft, then transform into a hi-tech mecha to finish off the enemy. Victories earn you credits that can be used to purchase powerful weapons and upgrades. Fully customize your abilities and use new powers, you choose how to make every battle unique. Become the mightiest weapon humanity has ever seen! Are you the hero Earth needs for ultimate justice? Features: - Maneuver, chase and fire in realistic Air Combat Mode, close with the enemy and destroy in thrilling Mecha Assault Mode - Fight hundreds of enemies and bosses, in the air and on the ground - Tally kills to purchase weapons & upgrades to customize your vehicle - Easy controls, stunning 3D effects and highly immersive graphics - Clear missions and reveal the storyline in Campaign Play, or master every level in Free Play
